body_html: I have ported most of the tensorflow c++ to a windows build use vc 2013. so far most code compile and linked use my own sources file. the biggest challenge for me to work around is that: it use static variable to register op and kernel. I build them as static library and app link to it will skip those static variable. I have to use a stub.cpp in app folder to include used ops and kernels.

body: I have ported most of the tensorflow c++ to a windows build use vc 2013. so far most code compile and linked use my own sources file. the biggest challenge for me to work around is that: it use static variable to register op and kernel. I build them as static library and app link to it will skip those static variable. I have to use a stub.cpp in app folder to include used ops and kernels.
